options.name: Spellfist Conduit
options.description: When your conduit is installed on either Gloves or an Unarmed Weapon worn on the hand, all of your Ray, Projectile and Melee Attack Spells that target a single creature have their range reduced to adjacent targets, but use your Unarmed Attack modifier instead of your Spell Attack modifier.

options.name: Disciplined Magic
options.description: Gain +1 Elemental Mitigation and +1 Damage with Unarmed Strikes

options.name: Free Action : Spellfist Charge
options.description: When you Channel a Ray, Projectile or Melee Attack Spell using your Spellfist Conduit it becomes Charged.

options.name: Extended Spellfist
options.description: The Range limitations on your Ray, Projectile and Melee Attack Spells from your Spellfist Conduit are removed.

options.name: Form of the Elementals
options.description: You gain the Elemental Fist Stance.
